# [Interview #1078: Steelheart Signing Report - Shardlet, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1078#16)

#### Question

Is Hoid any of the Shards of Adonalsium?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Good question. He does not hold a Shard.
